item.description:
FRIDAY JANUARY 25-MOONLIGHT AND MAGNOLIAS
with The Connecticut Theatre Group

Includes FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party starting at 7:15pm and Afterparty

ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED
PRE-PARTY AND AFTERPARTY INFO


Locked in a room for five days, three of Hollywood's greatest film collaborators rush to rewrite the screenplay for Gone with the Wind, which has halted production after three weeks.

In this uproarious farce, David O. Selznick and Victor Fleming hilariously enact scenes from Margaret Mitchell's famous novel, while Ben Hecht works furiously to perfect the dialogue.

An outrageous and intriguing peek into the back room of the Golden Age of Hollywood, audiences watch banana peels and peanut shells fly as these three race against the clock to produce one of the greatest films of all time.


"Frankly, my dear, this is one funny play. A rip-roaring farce [with] witty, pointed dialogue and hilarious situations"
- NY Daily News

"At once a hyperventilating slapstick comedy, an impassioned love song and a
blazing critique of Hollywood."
- Chicago Sun Times

Advance Ticket Discount - only $25

Tickets are $32.50 at the show

Your Ticket includes the Connecticut Theatre Group Pre-Party and Afterparty

Join The Connecticut Theatre Group for a FREE Wine and Cheese Party before the show!

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit www.CTTheatre.org

Call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket at the pre party or before the show starting at 7:15pm at the ticket window

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
